text: Ki ajiha bada jisa nu usa da mara karama cagam karake dikha'i'a gi'a phira uha usa nu caga samajhana laga tam alaha jisa nu cahuda hai bhataka dida hai ate jisa nu cahuda hai samajha dida hai. So unham la'i dukhi ho ke tusim apane apa nu soga vica na pa'um, alaha nu pata hai jihara kujha uha karade hana
